declare @tk varchar(32), @tu_ngay datetime, @den_ngay datetime, @ed int, @dFrom int, @dTo int, @current smalldatetime, @y int, @m int, @d int, @eom smalldatetime
select @current = getdate() select @y = year(@current), @m = month(@current), @d = day(@current) select @eom = dateadd(month, 1, cast(rtrim(@y) + replace(str(@m, 2), ' ', '0') + '01' as smalldatetime)) - 1
select @ed = day(@eom)
select @dFrom = case when ngay_cuoi_thang_tu = 0 then c_tu_ngay else @ed end, @dTo = case when ngay_cuoi_thang_den = 0 then c_den_ngay else @ed end from dmthongbao where ma_tb = '@@ma_tb' and status = '1' if @dFrom > @ed select @dFrom = @ed if @dTo > @ed select @dTo = @ed
select @tk = tk, @tu_ngay = case when type = 0 then d_tu_ngay when type = 1 then dateadd(day, c_tu_ngay_w - datepart(dw, @current), @current) + 1 when type = 2 then case when @d = @eom then @eom else dateadd(day, @dFrom - @d, @current) end else @current end , @den_ngay = case when type = 0 then d_den_ngay when type = 1 then dateadd(day, c_den_ngay_w - datepart(dw, @current), @current) + 1 when type = 2 then case when @d = @eom then @eom else dateadd(day, @dTo - @d, @current) end else @current end from dmthongbao where ma_tb = '@@ma_tb' and status = '1' select convert(varchar(10), @tu_ngay, 103) as date_from, convert(varchar(10), @den_ngay, 103) as date_to, @tk as tk
